# This file is generated by the script SetUpCtestFiles.py
# If possible, modify the script to fix any issues with the CMakeLists.txt files

file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/one-shot.cir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/one-shot.cir ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
file(COPY_FILE ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/tags ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/tags ONLY_IF_DIFFERENT)
add_test(NAME ONESHOT/one-shot.cir COMMAND Xyce one-shot.cir )
set_property(TEST ONESHOT/one-shot.cir PROPERTY LABELS "serial;nightly;parallel;bsim3")
set_tests_properties(ONESHOT/one-shot.cir PROPERTIES FIXTURES_SETUP one-shot.cir)
add_test(NAME ONESHOT/one-shot.cir.verify COMMAND ${XYCE_VERIFY} one-shot.cir ${OutputDataDir}/ONESHOT/one-shot.cir.prn one-shot.cir.prn )
set_tests_properties(ONESHOT/one-shot.cir.verify PROPERTIES FIXTURES_REQUIRED one-shot.cir)
